notes:
Chronological list of Avengers stories and appearances. Some of the characters are
  • Captain America (from issue 4)
  • Giant Man (from issue 1)
  • The Hulk (from issue 1)
  • Iron Man (from issue 1)
  • Thor (from issue 1)
  • The Vision (from issue 57)
  • The Wasp (from issue 1)
